Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the image by stating that it is a historic scene that people have been waiting to see in Indian history.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide any evidence or supporting information to back up its assertion that the image is significant in Indian history.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image depicts Prime Minister Narendra Modi surrounded by world leaders, without providing any evidence or context to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the possibility that the image may have been manipulated or altered in some way, as evidenced by the Business Insider article that identified it as a fake image.
